Sentencas: The performance and degradation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC) were studied under severe operating conditions.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell performance under severe operating conditions

Sentencas: The cells studied were manufactured in a small series by ECN, in the framework of the EU funded CORE-SOFC project.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell performance under severe operating conditions

Sentencas: The cells were of the anode-supported type with a double layer LSM cathode.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell performance under severe operating conditions

Sentencas: They were operated at 750 degrees C or 850 degrees C in hydrogen with 5% or 50% water at current densities ranging from 0.25 A cm(-2) to 1 A cm(-2) for periods of 300 hours or more.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell performance under severe operating conditions

Sentencas: The area specific cell resistance, corrected for fuel utilisation, ranged between 0.20 Omega cm(2) and 0.34 Omega cm(2) at 850 degrees C and 520 mV, and between 0.51 Omega cm(2) and 0.92 Omega cm(2) at 750 degrees C and 520 mV. The degradation of cell performance was found to be low (ranging from 0 to 8%/1,000 hours) at regular operating conditions.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell performance under severe operating conditions

Sentencas: Voltage degradation rates of 20 to 40%/1,000 hours were observed under severe operating conditions, depending on the test conditions.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell performance under severe operating conditions

Sentencas: Data analysis revealed a critical cell voltage of ca 750 mV, above which the degradation rates were trivial, but below which they were significant.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell performance under severe operating conditions

Sentencas: Some cells were also tested using a different procedure to that usually applied at Riso.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell performance under severe operating conditions

Sentencas: This gave a different aging behaviour, indicating that the detailed test circumstances may be decisive to the outcome.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell performance under severe operating conditions
